run_info.input_toml:
# this uncoveres a specific error case in the fastp
# which is apperantly triggered by reads without name/quality
# and some kind of buffering - recompressing the data
# essentially eliminates the error.

# I haven't managed to cut the 14mb example file down in size.
[input]
	read2 = 'input_r2.fq.gz'

[[step]]
	action= 'Report'
	label = 'default'
	count = true

[output]
	prefix='output'
	format = 'None'
	report_json = true
